summary: The diff clearly adds an "Admin Login" button in the desktop header actions and wires it to navigate to "/admin-login". Due to truncation of the mobile menu portion and absence of route/guard diffs, mobile-menu placement and admin-route redirect behavior cannot be fully verified from the provided changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Clearing the React Query cache on admin logout (queryClient.clear())
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is UI navigation only and explicitly says not to change the admin authentication mechanism or backend behavior; clearing the query cache changes client-side session/data behavior beyond adding a navigation entry point.
evidence: frontend/src/components/layout/Header.tsx (truncated) â€” imports useQueryClient, calls queryClient.clear() in handleAdminLogout
